elements.text: Does anyone know how to solve a network of SDE ?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

Success, it has been cross posted <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/56706| to Discourse>. Keep and eye out on Discourse for responses and please add an answer there once you are satisfied with the solution so others can benefit as well. Happy debugging!
Thank you Chris for the link and your nice video on JuliaHub. unfortunately I couldn’t find a solution for *network* implementation! I can solve it for N=1, but not for N >1

implementation! I can solve it for N=1, but not for N >1

text: see the tutorial I just posted which has an example for a system of equations.
